name: Swashbuckler
description: Many warriors rely on brute force, weighty armor, or cumbersome weapons. For you, battle is a dance where you move among foes with style and grace. You dart among combatants with flair and land powerful finishing moves with a flick of the wrist and a flash of the blade, all while countering attacks with elegant ripostes that keep enemies off balance.

name: Swashbuckler Archetype
description: You fight with flair and style, adding swashbuckling tricks to your combat repertoire.
